__e: There's only one person in my life who's always been there for me who's never too busy to listen who reassures me when I'm scared comforts me when I'm sad and who showers me with endless love without ever asking anything in return.
- You are gonna listen to me! You are gonna talk to me, and you are gonna talk to me now!
Look, I know it sounds crazy, but you're gonna have to listen to me and trust me.
